events.message: I ordered a jacket two weeks ago but now I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit properly and the color is different from what I expected.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the product and requesting money back.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refunds for resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and receive a refund. Iâ€™m here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or washed? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, the order number is #458932. The jacket is brand new, never worn or washed. I just want to return it due to the sizing issue.
Thank you for the information! I have initiated the refund process for your order. You will receive an email with the return shipping label shortly.
I appreciate the quick help. I look forward to the label so I can return the jacket as soon as possible.
The refund process is now set up and the return label has been sent to your email. Please send the jacket back within 14 days for a full refund.
Just checking in to see if you received the return label and if you have any questions regarding the refund process.
Yes, I got the label and have already shipped the jacket back. Thank you for following up.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your refund experience to help us improve our service.
This case has been closed following successful refund completion and no further customer inquiries.
